channel.title: [614] Help With a Few Things [614]
channel.description:
Hey i'm using shabba 56's source http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,453927.0.html and I need help with a few things....
How do I make myself admin?
And how do I make it so everyone can use ::master? Currently only admins can use it
And maybe also how to add a ::yell command or ::spec?
Thanks :)

item.title: [614] Help With a Few Things [614]
item.dc:creator: @Dragon_202 Dragon 202
item.description:
@Dragon_202 wrote:

need a little help with that also heres the master
} else if (command.equals(“master”)) {
for (int i = 0; i < 25; i++) {
p.getSkills().addXp(i, Skills.MAXIMUM_EXP);
}

Read full topic

item.title: [614] Help With a Few Things [614]
item.dc:creator: @Anc13nts253 Anc13nts253
item.description:
@Anc13nts253 wrote:

Change the rights for it to 0, or if it says anything like

&& adminPlayer just remove it,

Better yet, post your Master command.

Read full topic
